title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\V2\FormatMessage
name: FormatMessage
description:
Represents a message with parameters.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.clouddebugger.v2.FormatMessage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.format
params.description: Format template for the message. The format uses placeholders $0, $1, etc. to reference parameters. $$ can be used to denote the $ character. Examples: Failed to load '$0' which helps debug $1 the first time it is loaded. Again, $0 is very important. Please pay $$10 to use $0 instead of $1.

params.name: data.parameters
params.description: Optional parameters to be embedded into the message.

methods.name: getFormat

Examples:

  • Please pay $$10 to use $0 instead of $1.
